fields.label: If you owe duty
fields.infoText:
## If you owe duty 
If you have a Direct Debit set up for this tax, you don't need to do anything. Your payment will be collected automatically.  

Otherwise, paying electronically is an easy and secure way to pay. Use the details below and make sure you include your registration number (XZGR 00000 123456) on any payment.  

Sort code: 08-32-00  
Account number: 12000903  
Account name: HMRC Miscellaneous
Make sure you pay the duty owed or you may face a penalty.
